Text: Customer Account s Cc Bob Ben Richard Ring with the Power desk is needing information on accounts under your management see email below Can you please forward this request to the appropriate persons to respond to the request thanks Victor Forwarded by Victor GonzalezHOUEES on AM Vinay Adenwala PM To Victor ES cc Richard ES Subject Customer Account s Hello Victor My name is Vini Adenwala Im doing some research for Narsimha Misra and Richard Ring for the East Power Risk Mgmt Dept and I wanted to ask you for some information regarding our customers in Massachusetts I have a list of contracts here Polaroid Corporation Quebecor Printing USA Corp Simon Property Corp Sonoco Products Co Lucent Technologies Inc Haverhill Police Station BICC General Cable Industries Inc What I need to get from you is a customer list along w their account s for each of these contracts and Richard told me you were the person I should talk to If you could provide me with a list of the individuals responsible for billing each account or even the customer acct s themselves I would greatly appreciate it Thank you for your time and cooperation Regards Vinay Adenwala

Re Customer Account sI have the names of the persons that need to respond but I have not had time to send out an email which I will do ASAP Victor Richard Ring AM To Victor ES cc Subject Customer Account s Victor Have you had any time to address Vinays request Thanks Richard Forwarded by Richard RingHOUEES on AM Vinay Adenwala PM To Victor ES cc Richard ES Subject Customer Account s Hello Victor My name is Vini Adenwala Im doing some research for Narsimha Misra and Richard Ring for the East Power Risk Mgmt Dept and I wanted to ask you for some information regarding our customers in Massachusetts I have a list of contracts here Polaroid Corporation Quebecor Printing USA Corp Simon Property Corp Sonoco Products Co Lucent Technologies Inc Haverhill Police Station BICC General Cable Industries Inc What I need to get from you is a customer list along w their account s for each of these contracts and Richard told me you were the person I should talk to If you could provide me with a list of the individuals responsible for billing each account or even the customer acct s themselves I would greatly appreciate it Thank you for your time and cooperation Regards Vinay Adenwala
